# selectedIndirectPointerTouchMode

**Instance Property**

The currently selected pointer mode.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var selectedIndirectPointerTouchMode: PaperMarkupViewController.TouchMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

Default is `.selection`
